Package chess.board.utils

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
chess.board.utils.Cell
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
Class which defines Cell of chess board.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Pieces piece
    A cell is representing square(Black/White) on chessboard, which can be empty or have a piece.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Cell​(Pieces piece, boolean isBlack)
    Two param constructor for cell with piece and isBlack
    Cell​(java.lang.Boolean isBlack)
    Single param constructor for Cell with defining color and null piece.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getFile()
    getFile() return file of cell.
    Pieces getPiece()
    getPiece() Gets the piece that is on the current cell
    int getRank()
    getRank() return rank of cell.
    boolean isBlack()
    isBlack() Checks if the cell is black or not
    void setFile​(int file)
    setFile() set file of cell.
    void setPiece​(Pieces piece)
    setPiece() To set a piece in this cell.
    void setRank​(int rank)
    setRank() set rank of cell.

      Two param constructor for cell with piece and isBlack
      Parameters:
      piece - - current piece in cell
      isBlack - - true if cell is black and false if cell is white
